p: Qairooti is the name of ointments specifically prescribed for chest diseases. Qairooti aarad karsana is a polyherbal Unani formulation based on the following ingredients: Aarad e Karsana ( Pisum sativum L., Leguminosae, flour), Aarad e Hulba ( Trigonella adscendens (Nevski) Afan. & Gontsch., Leguminosae, flour) - 60 g each, Kalonji ( Nigella sativa L., Ranunculaceae, seeds), Asl-us-Soos ( Glycyrrhiza glabra L., Leguminosae, root) - 24 g each, Aqarqarha ( Anacyclus pyrethrum (L.) Lag., Compositae, root) - 18 g, Roghan-e-Sosan ( Iris ensata Tunb., Iridaceae, oil) and Bees Wax- both in equal amount, quantum satis, to make a paste ( Anonymous, 2006).
